title: Sleeping Strawberry Guesthouse
description: A woman-only veggie house in Sinchon/Hongdae, Seoul, catering to women backpackers and travelers. It provides a water purifier by red clay ceramic ball, so guests don't have to buy bottled water. Vegan meals are available upon request. Korean vegan cooking class included local market tour is available. Check-in is from 2-10pm, check-out at 11am.
